title: Pregnancy complications and birth outcomes following low-level exposure to per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances in the Vitamin D Antenatal Asthma Reduction Trial

Per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS) are a group of synthetic, highly fluorinated aliphatic compounds, commonly utilised in a wide variety of consumer products with diverse applications. Since the genesis of...
